crop.title: Crop
crop.description: Show success message after cropping to selection

blur.title: Blur
blur.description: Show success message after applying blur

save.title: Save
save.description: Show success message after saving image

transform.title: Transform
transform.description: Show success message after rotating or flipping image

adjustment.title: Adjustment
adjustment.description: Show success message after color/tone adjustments and filters

clipboard.title: Clipboard
clipboard.description: Show success message after copying selection to clipboard

history.title: History
history.description: Show success message after undo/redo operations

selection.title: Selection
selection.description: Show success message after selection operations

autoSelectTolerance.title: Auto-Select Tolerance
autoSelectTolerance.description: Color difference tolerance for auto-selection (0-255). Lower values require more similar colors to be considered background.

largeImageThreshold.title: Large Image Threshold
largeImageThreshold.description: File size threshold (in MB) for applying optimizations. Images larger than this will use async decoding and compressed history.

maxHistorySize.title: Maximum History Size
maxHistorySize.description: Maximum number of undo/redo states to keep (reduced automatically for large images).

enablePreloading.title: Enable Image Preloading
enablePreloading.description: Preload adjacent images in the background for instant navigation. Uses more memory but makes navigation feel instant.

wheelNavigationDelay.title: Mouse Wheel Navigation Delay
wheelNavigationDelay.description: Minimum delay (in milliseconds) between mouse wheel navigation events. Higher values prevent accidental rapid scrolling.
